bleh. I am totally angry @ this dolphin emulator. Game seems to load fine for me and the sound and graphics look great but i cannot get any response from keyboard controls.  Ive posted in the dolphin forums but no answers.  

I dont know what is wrong, in the key bindings it shows all the keyboard keys should be set.  

Im going to try to buy a gamepad and see if it works :/   ive never had any problem with using a keyboard for emulators until now..
yo this game work perfect now i will try with dolphine emulator

@Inflikkt:

The keyboard controls won't work because the game needs you to swing the Wii remote to emulate Link swinging his sword. The keyboard doesn't have a motion sensor and...doesn't swing well. Get a Bluetooth dongle (it's amazingly cheap) and connect your Wii remote to your computer. Dolphin works fine that way.
This is a fine upload... but a very mediocre game. Thanks anyway.

This torrent is being tracked. Just got a letter from my ISP. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
